name: interlobular
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between lobes (= parts) of an organ in the body: interlobular connective tissue interlobular arteries
More examplesFewer examplesEach ovary has between thirteen and sixteen lobes with an interlobular vein and artery between them.This interlobular tissue contains capillaries and other specialized cells.Examination of the liver may reveal damage to the interlobular bile ducts.The number of stained cells and the intensity of staining was highest near the interlobular vein.The interlobular arteries branch out extensively and form capillary networks.
